alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 12:50AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...The weather system that brought heavy snow has moved off to the southeast, and accumulating snow is no longer expected. Therefore the Winter Storm Warning has been cancelled. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Central Oregon. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST early this morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
